params.identityVerificationHubAddress: The address of the Identity Verification Hub V2

getConfigId(bytes32,bytes32,bytes).details: Override of the SelfVerificationRoot virtual function

returns._0: The scope value used for verification
bool True if user has active verification

onVerificationSuccess(bytes,bytes).custom:flow: This function decodes the output and calls the customizable verification hook
onVerificationSuccess(bytes,bytes).custom:security: Only the authorized hub contract can call this function
onVerificationSuccess(bytes,bytes).details: Only callable by the identity verification hub V2 contract for security

params.output: The verification output data containing disclosed identity information
params.userData: The user-defined data passed through the verification process

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._user: Address of the user to revoke

scope().details: Public view function to access the current scope setting

returns._0: The scope value that proofs must match

setConfigId(bytes32).details: Only callable by the contract owner

params.configId: The verification config ID to set

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

verifySelfProof(bytes,bytes).custom:data-format: proofPayload = | 32 bytes attestationId | proofData |userContextData = | 32 bytes destChainId | 32 bytes userIdentifier | data |hubData = | 1 bytes contract version | 31 bytes buffer | 32 bytes scope | 32 bytes attestationId | proofData |
verifySelfProof(bytes,bytes).details: Parses relayer data format and validates against contract settings before calling hub V2

params.proofPayload: Packed data from relayer in format: | 32 bytes attestationId | proof data |
params.userContextData: User-defined data in format: | 32 bytes destChainId | 32 bytes userIdentifier | data |

getConfigId(bytes32,bytes32,bytes).notice: Generates a configId for the user

getNationalityRecord(address).notice: Get nationality record for a specific user

getUserNationality(address).notice: Get nationality for a specific user

isUserVerified(address).notice: Check if a user has an active nationality verification

nationalityRecords(address).notice: Mapping from user address to their nationality record

onVerificationSuccess(bytes,bytes).notice: Callback function called upon successful verification by the hub contract

revokeVerification(address).notice: Revoke a user's nationality verification (emergency only)

verificationConfig().notice: Verification configuration stored in wire format

verificationConfigId().notice: Verification config ID for identity verification

verifiedUsers(uint256).notice: Array of all verified user addresses (for enumeration)

verifySelfProof(bytes,bytes).notice: Verifies a self-proof using the bytes-based interface
